amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow local government to use up to 20 percent of its payment for public land projects but would not require it.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to give each eligible county the option of using 20 percent of its distribution for community based projects rather than to require it.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Udall (CO) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 241 (Roll no. 559).
